sentences.sContent: Muslim and Jewish leaders have issued statements deploring the violence and urging the United Nations to take action.
sentences.sCn: 伊斯兰教和犹太教领袖已经发表声明谴责该暴力行为，并敦促联合国采取行动。

synos.tran: 谴责；悲悼；哀叹；对…深感遗憾

remMethod.val: de(表加强) + plor(流泪， 哭泣) + e → 非常伤心地哭泣 → 悲叹

trans.tranCn: 悲叹， 哀叹， 公开谴责
trans.tranOther: If you say that you deplore something, you think it is very wrong or immoral
